entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 23. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
